definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: My Dad looked at me for the longest tine, and his eyes started to tear up.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸盯着我看了好長時間，潸然淚下。

sentences.english: The king eats a few tasteless mouthfuls , then bursts into tears.
sentences.chinese: 他在喫過幾口這無味的食品後便潸然淚下。
